mapper.insert: insert into IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE (SUBSCRIBEID, UNDERWRITERID, COMMODITYID, SUBSCRIBECOUNTS, PROPORTION, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{subscribeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{underwriterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribecounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.select: select SUBSCRIBEID, UNDERWRITERID, COMMODITYID, SUBSCRIBECOUNTS, PROPORTION, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE where SUBSCRIBEID = #{subscribeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
